about_the_game:
As a specialist in P.A.N.I.C, you are part of a highly trained military task force sent to investigate paranormal threats in a cursed forest. What starts as a routine mission spirals into chaos, forcing you to confront overwhelming fear and the urge to PANIC. Ancient spirits, cryptic forces, and supernatural phenomena haunt your every step, challenging even the most elite soldiers. To survive, you’ll need to overcome the PANIC threatening your mind while using every ounce of courage, skill, and strategy.

Key Features:

  • Horror Experience: Play as a member of an elite military unit equipped with specialized weaponry and tools, but face the unknown with no backup. Strategy and precision are essential as you face enemies that can’t simply be outgunned.

  • Dynamic Paranormal Threats: From unseen wraiths that stalk your squad to dark anomalies that defy the laws of physics, the forest itself seems alive. Each encounter forces you to adapt or perish.

  • Exploration and Resource Management: Search for supplies, improve your equipment and find paranormal collectables scattered throughout the forest. But be warned: some items may attract the attention of vengeful spirits.

  • Atmospheric Psychological Horror: Confront the terrifying effects of isolation and despair as supernatural occurrences unravel the minds of even the toughest soldiers.

The forest will test you, pushing your sanity and survival instincts to the edge. Can you and your team complete the mission, or will P.A.N.I.C claim another lost squad?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join the elite P.A.N.I.C unit in this 5-player co-op horror game. Enter a cursed forest filled with paranormal activity and test your survival skills. Can your ghost-hunting team escape the dark forest, or will you PANIC under pressure?
